jonaza45, well done on making a foolish reputation for yourself. The most powerful processor so far reaches around 4.8 GHz, or even less. Try to confirm your facts before you put others down.


About the PS2X (0.9.4):-

Works surprisingly well with Quad Core 2.40 GHz computer. You actually get the bios screen working well. But of course you need a middle-range graphics card and also you need to reduce the graphics quality setting in the plugin.

If you have dual/quad core, then enable the MTGS and DC in the CPU Settings.

Thanks a lot to piaoginn for the BIOS files.
